Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Centro Siloe Residence Hotel in Milan (Niguarda), you'll be convenient to Niguarda Ca Granda Hospital and Instituto Ortopedico Galeazzi. This 4-star residence is within close proximity of Museo d'Arte Paolo Pini and Quanta Sport Village.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 89 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming provides entertainment. Conveniences include desks, housekeeping is provided on a limited basis, and microwaves can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an indoor pool, a steam room, and a fitness center. This residence also features complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the residence's restaurant, which features a bar. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café. For your convenience, a complimentary breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in Milan? This residence has 70 square feet (7 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is 10 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the residence's restaurant, which features a bar. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café. For your convenience, a complimentary breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Centro Siloe Residence Hotel in Milan (Niguarda), you'll be convenient to Niguarda Ca Granda Hospital and Instituto Ortopedico Galeazzi. This 4-star residence is within close proximity of Museo d'Arte Paolo Pini and Quanta Sport Village.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Niguarda Ca Granda Hospital - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Instituto Ortopedico Galeazzi - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Museo d'Arte Paolo Pini - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Quanta Sport Village - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
University of Milano-Bicocca - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Teatro degli Arcimboldi - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Parco Nord Milano - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Metropoli - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Ex Campo dei Fiori - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Cimitero Monumentale di Milano - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Grattacielo Pirelli - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Vittore Buzzi Children's Hospital - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Pirelli Tower - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
10 Corso Como - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Corso Como - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi

The preferred airport for Centro Siloe Residence Hotel is Milan (LIN-Linate) - 9.7 km / 6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
